Name: Colorize
About the game: It was a magnificent feast in the peaceful Colored-Pencil Kingdom. One day, a strange wizard made the kingdom into darkness and disappeared. You, a brave adventurer, should save the kingdom by colorizing the world became dark and restore the kingdom peaceful again. Will you succeed in finding the wizard and saving the world? Dark stuffs neither work nor move. You can animate the stuffs by using a colorizing-skill. Features of the game 2D puzzle adventure using colorizing. Originally, stuffs do not move. Animate the dark stuffs by colorizing. Do not colorize things recklessly. You should consider where and when to colorize things within limited chances to colorize. You could feel more interesting by empathizing with characters in the story. The story is suitable for everyone, children and adults. Give yourself peace of mind by playing this game.
